What I Do

I make beautiful and useable websites for individuals, startups and established organizations. Below are three types of services I offer.

PSD to HTML

I can convert your Photoshop designs into standards-compliant, cross-browser compatible and mobile friendly HTML5 markup and styles.

  • Cross-browser and W3C standard compliant
  • Low-bandwidth, lean and clean code base.
  • Mobile friendly and responsive upon request.

Wordpress Based Websites

I can build custom Wordpress based website that fits your needs.

  • Work with any design.
  • Custom themes/plugins.
  • Wordpress setup/upgrade.

Custom Website

I can develop custom web applications. I can work with popular web APIs.

  • Custom microsites.
  • Web applications & APIs.
  • Member-only web portals.

I am available for short-term small-scale projects. Drop me an email -
"j @ jshamsul.com" and we'll see where we go from there. Here are other ways to get in touch.

If you are looking at a large-scale full-blown web campaign or interactive digital product, you might want to drop an email to EzyPzy, a digital agency that I'm currently working at. They have enough resource to help with your next big thing.
